## On this slide we plot some Gaussian random numbers

```{r}
x <- rnorm(100,0,1)
plot(x)
```

--- 

## On this slide we plot some binomial random numbers

```{r}
x <- rbinom(100,3,0.6)
plot(x)
```

---

## On this slide we plot some Poisson random numbers

```{r}
x <- rpois(100,4)
plot(x)
```
